name: Orange Amino Sauce
description: Indulge in the tangy and sweet essence of our Orange Amino Sauce, perfectly crafted for those pursuing a healthy lifestyle. This low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar recipe aligns with your nutritional goals while tantalizing your taste buds. Ideal for adding a zestful twist to your meals, this sauce is a must-try for anyone looking to enhance their culinary creations without compromising on health.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the oranges and remove all the white pith and seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, blend the peeled oranges until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Strain the orange juice through a fine mesh sieve to remove any remaining pulp.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the orange juice into a small saucepan and add the coconut amino. Stir to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the sauce to a simmer over low heat, stirring occasionally, until it thickens to your desired consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
